Controller.Entities

Class PlayerBody

  • java.lang.Object
    • Controller.Entities.EntityBody
      • Controller.Entities.PlayerBody

  • public class PlayerBody
extends EntityBody
    This class implements the necessary methods to define the physical body of a player.
